jobTitle: Senior Data Analyst, Bloomberg Industry Classifications (BICS)
jobDescription: Bloomberg runs on data, and in the Global Data team we're responsible for acquiring it and providing it to our clients. We collect, analyze, process and publish the data which is the backbone of our iconic Bloomberg Terminal- the facts and figures which ultimately move the financial markets. We apply problem-solving skills to identify innovative workflow efficiencies and we implement technology solutions to enhance our systems, products and processes- and all this while delivering advanced insights to our clients.  The Bloomberg Industry Classifications (BICS) Data Team is responsible for the timely and accurate entry and maintenance of industry classification data. They are also responsible for supporting the Financial Product and Sales teams by engaging in client outreach efforts and acting as subject matter experts within the classification business. The team works closely with other Global Data teams as well as Bloomberg News and Data Systems Engineering.  What's the role?  The Bloomberg Industry Classifications Data Team is looking for a highly motivated and driven Senior Data Analyst to cover sales team support, quality control, and stakeholder management within the Classification business. You will be directly responsible for the review and analysis of data, creating client support materials, and maintenance of all Bloomberg generated classification data.
